entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , New Tecumseth
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:43 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Egbert 1:00 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
Temperature: -8.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -10.7°C
Wind: ESE 18 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of freezing drizzle. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle or ice pellets at times mixed with light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle changing to a few flurries near midnight. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 early in the afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 16. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
